page.title: 06LOCAL NEWS SAMPLE MAY 1985
page.content:
Sources: local newspapers, local radio regional television:
350 NEW JOBS - full & part-time are to be created in June 85 when a Tesco Superstore opens at Lunsford Park, Larkfield.
BRIGHTER SCHOOL DINNERS - in a bid to fight off fast-food chains a massive marketing campaign is underway throughout the county
110 NEW JOBS - at Safeways Suerstore May 85. It is the first store with a computer controlled (POS) checkout. It includes a checkout for the disabled.
"BURLINGTON" TYPE SHOPPING ARCADE The "Royal Star" Hotel, Earl St. is to converted to the "Star Arcade", with 19 small shops and one larger store.
